CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'App Received'),'App Received', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'App Processed'),'App Processed', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'Indicative Issued'),'Indicative Issued',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Indicative Accepted'), 'Indicative Accepted',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c,'Val Ordered'),'Val Ordered',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Val Received'), 'Val Received', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Recommended'), 'Recommended', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'LOO Issued'), 'LOO Issued', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Formally Approved'), 'Formally Approved', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'LOO Accepted'), 'LOO Accepted', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Loan Settled'), 'Loan Settled',IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'APPROVED'), 'Approved', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Declined'), 'Declined', IF(ISPICKVAL(genesis__Application__r.genesis__Status__c, 'Cancelled'), 'Cancelled', 'Approved - Converted to Contract'))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Application Status
